Package controller

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Observer
    Defines the Observer interface for the Observer Pattern.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddIssue
    Defines the command to add a new issue.
    CloseIssue
    Defines the command to close the selected issue.
    Command
    Defines the blueprint for all commands in this application.
    CommentIssue
    Defines the command to add a comment to the given issue.
    Controller
    Defines the Controller that coordinates between the views and the Model.
    ControllerTest
    JUnit test class for Controller.
    EditIssue
    Defines the command to edit the given issue.
    ListCommand
    Defines the list command.
    Parser
    Defines the parser class to parse the input commands.
    ParserTest
    Defines the unit test for Parser class.
    SelectIssue
    Defines the command to select an issue from the currently selected repository.
    SelectRepo
    Defines the command class that selects a repository from the list.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    CommandType
    Defines the command type and their list of aliases.
